sent.orig: Widely used Web server Apache、Linux operating system and DNS server'SAND are both from Open source software.
sent.trans: 广泛应用的Web服务器Apache、Linux操作系统以及域名服务器中的SAND无不属于开源软件。

sent.orig: Sand production and sand control are main problems during development of loose sand.
sent.trans: 出砂、防砂问题是疏松砂岩油气层开发过程中永恒的主题。

sent.orig: We main manufacture: dredger, sand pumping vessel, sand filter, transporter, sand selecting equipment, conveyer belt, etc.
sent.trans: 公司主要生产：挖沙船、抽沙船、筛沙机、运输船、沙石精选设备、输送带、磁选机、等矿山机械设备。

sent.orig: Applicable sand material: Aluminum oxide Sand of ＃26-＃320, carborundum, glass beads, Plastic sand blasting grains.
sent.trans: 适用砂材：＃26-＃320氧化铝砂、金刚砂、玻璃珠、塑胶喷砂粒等。

sent.orig: Sand is a sub-meat hot pot assorted hot sand and sand-assorted hot pot 2.
sent.trans: 砂火锅是分肉什锦砂火锅和素什锦砂火锅2种。
